typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(year),
	minRating = round(min(toInteger(Rating)),2)) ~> minRatingByYear
source1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DuplicateSource
DuplicateSource, minRatingByYear join(DuplicateSource@year == minRatingByYear@year,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year = DuplicateSource@year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato,
		year = minRatingByYear@year,
		minRating
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PruneDupes
minRatingByYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
PruneDupes sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
